name: Separated (Comic Meteor)
description:
Forcefully work together with your enemy ('s limbs) to survive the lab.

The levels are infinite, so see how far you can make it! Walk into the purple square to complete a level.

Controls:

E - inventory

WASD - for movement

ESC - to exit to menu

Left-click for the left arm 

Right-click for the right arm 

Space for the head

Made in 7 days by a team of two for the Brackeys Game Jam 2021
